Comments_List: Through this course I had the opportunity to receive the most attentive feedback on my writing that I have received thus far at Yale. In addition, the course's use of Yale's manuscript collections allowed me to improve my research skills.
The only weakness of this course is that it won't be offered again!

The model for learning in which students have the opportunity to read their papers aloud for feedback every other week is a fantastic learning opportunity. More courses should be structured with built-in peer review.
